landingView.landingText: With Digital Menu, digitize your menus, minimize contact in your business. Do not put yourself, your employees, and your customers at risk.

description.title: What is Digital Menu?
description.content: Developed to reduce contact in places where people congregate, such as cafes and restaurants, during the COVID-19 period, Digital Menu brings your physical menus to the digital environment. After you create your menu on the Digital Menu, you position your special QR code on your tables and allow your customers to view your menu. By transferring your menus to the digital environment with the Digital Menu, you'll minimize the risk of contracting COVID-19 to yourself, your employees, and your customers through the menu.

features.title: Features
features.subTitle: All Your Need Together
features.description: We have listed for you the most basic features of the Digital Menu, where you can create all the content that should be in a menu. We continue to develop the Digital Menu and add new features to the Digital Menu every day.

items.title: Product Image
items.description: By adding images to your products, you can make them more attractive.

items.title: Multi Langauge Support
items.description: You can create your product information in English as an alternative to Turkish. Do not forget that these options may increase in line with the demands from you.

items.title: Multi Currency Support
items.description: When creating your menus, you will only set your prices in TRY. The Digital Menu allows you to display the prices in USD and EUR for you.

items.title: Customized QR Code
items.description: For those who want to use QR codes in their own designs, you can customize the basic features (color, size...) of QR codes.

items.title: Creating Product Group
items.description: If you want multiple products to appear as a single option, you can group your products.

items.title: Theme Customization
items.description: Digital Menu allows you to customize many components on the page your customers visit.

items.title: Complete Your Subscription
items.description: Choose best subscription package for you.

items.title: Add Your Products
items.description: Create your menu by adding your products with information such as price, image, description.

items.title: Place Your QR Code
items.description: After printing the QR code created specifically for you, place it on your tables.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subTitle: Choose your best subscription for you.

registerView.pageDescription: After completing your registration, you can start using the 14-day trial version.
registerView.disclaimer: By clicking the 'Register' button, you'll agree to our privacy policy.

questions.question: What is Digital Menu?
questions.answer: COVID-19 döneminde kafe, restoran gibi, insanların bir araya geldikleri mekanlarda teması azaltmak amacıyla geliştirilen Digital Menu, fiziksel menülerinizi dijital ortama taşır. Dijital Menu'de menünüzü oluşturduktan sonra size özel QR kodunuzu masalarınıza konumlandırarak misafirlerinizin menünüzü görüntülemesini sağlarsınız. Dijital Menu ile menülerinizi dijital ortama taşıyarak kendinize, çalışma arkadaşlarınıza ve misafirlerinize menü yoluyla COVID-19 bulaşma riskini minimuma indirmiş olursunuz.

questions.question: What are the advantages of the Digital Menu?
How can I register to the Digital Menu?
How can I contact with the Digital Menu?
My subscription was expired. What should I do?
My subscription was expired. Is my data will be deleted?
